name: The Cold Case of Noella Bejerot
name_original: The Cold Case of Noella Bejerot
description:
Story

When Grace leaves home, she falls into a job as a detective at the local police department. Working with a team of experts, she investigates crime scenes, examines evidence, and interviews suspects to catch killers and stop murders all while trying to impress her new boss. All this while trying to conceal from experienced detectives the secret that she faints at the sight of blood. 

Features
  • Fully Voiced
  • Six cases to solve
  • Four Unique Endings
  • Unique and Quirky Art Style
  • Playable on PC and Mac
